author: IGN
description:
Vampire Survivors VR is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements, except now, it's in Virtual Reality! Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Gather gold in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor. Slay hordes of monsters while seated or standing in dioramic 3D voxel created environments of the Mad Forest, Inlaid Library, Dairy Plant and more. Also includes Vampire Survivors: Legacy of the Moonspell and Vampire Survivors: Tides of the Foscari.


#Gaming #vr  #VampireSurvivors
title: Vampire Survivors VR - 20 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A financial report from Ubisoft may have revealed the release date for the long-rumored Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag remake. An entry for an 'unannounced title' dropped March 31st, 2026 is fueling speculation that the remake will be announced soon. The title is supposedly being made by the Ubisoft Shanghai team, the same studio behind Skull & Bones, which itself started as a spinoff of the original AC: Black Flag. In other news, some old friends will be popping up in Resident Evil: Requiem, but don't get too excited over the possibility of playing as multiple protagonists. Requiem's producer confirmed that past characters will show up, but he said to not "over-hype it." And finally, Nintendo is taking down fan-made character art in Kirby Air Riders, specifically those of a bikini-clad Chef Kawasaki. Yes, that's a sentence you just read.
title: Assassin's Creed: Black Flag Remake Release Date Reportedly Leaked - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Brass Rain, an upcoming action World War 2 first-person shooter developed by Yarnhub Animation Studios. Players will experience expansive battles on the frontlines of one of humanity's deadliest conflicts rooted in real history. Unlock true-to-form World War 2-era weapons, uniforms, vehicles, and more in Brass Rain, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Brass Rain - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Return to Silent Hill, an upcoming action horror film distributed by Konami and Cineverse. Witness the thriller that's inspired by the iconic video game franchise with Return to Silent Hill, in theaters on January 23, 2026.

When a mysterious letter calls him back to Silent Hill searching for his lost love, James finds a once-recognizable town and encounters figures both familiar and new and begins to question his own sanity.

Return to Silent Hill stars Hannah Emily Anderson, Jeremy Irvine, Robert Strange, Evie Templeton, Pearse Egan, Eve Macklin, Emily Carding, and more. The film is directed by Christophe Gans and written by Christophe Gans, Hiroyuki Owaku, and William Josef Schneider. 

Return to Silent Hill is in theaters on January 23, 2026.

#ReturnToSilentHill #Movies #IGN
title: Return to Silent Hill - Official Trailer (2026) Hannah Emily Anderson, Jeremy Irvine, Robert Strange

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the PC Launch Trailer for the Xbox Full Screen Experience, a software console-inspired addition to PC Handhelds and PC developed by Microsoft. Players on PC and PC Handhelds offer an Xbox-inspired full-screen experience with a controller-navigable UI, the ability to easily browse and launch titles from across their game libraries, and more. Xbox Full Screen Experience is available now for Windows 11 handhelds currently in market and in preview for Windows 11 PCs.
title: Xbox Full Screen Experience - Official PC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'In Theaters on December 5' Teaser Trailer for Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair, an upcoming action crime thriller film. Quentin Tarantino’s Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair unites Volume 1 and Volume 2 into a single, unrated epic—presented exactly as he intended, complete with a new, never-before-seen anime sequence. Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair arrives exclusively in theaters December 5, 2025.

Uma Thurman stars as The Bride, left for dead after her former boss and lover Bill ambushes her wedding rehearsal, shooting her in the head and stealing her unborn child. To exact her vengeance, she must first hunt down the four remaining members of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad before confronting Bill himself. 

With its operatic scope, relentless action, and iconic style, The Whole Bloody Affair stands as one of cinema’s definitive revenge sagas—rarely shown in its complete form, and now presented with a classic intermission.

Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affa
title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Uma Thurman

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Mafia: The Old Country trailer for the action-adventure game for another look at the Free Ride update, which brings the Free Ride Mode, with car and horse races, brutal combat and stealth challenges, and new secrets hidden throughout the Valle Dorata. 

The Free Ride Mode also features the Cinema Siciliano Mode for a vintage film aesthetic. Take the wheel with first-person driving, and push your limits in Classic Difficulty. Unlock new cars, stylish outfits, legendary weapons, and game-changing charms that redefine how you play. The Free Ride update for Mafia: The Old Country is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #MafiaTheOldCountry #ActionGame
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official Free Ride Update Launch Trailer

description:
Meet Kentrosaurus in this latest Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer for the park management sim game. 

Build your own Jurassic World. Nurture generations of dinosaurs with the series debut of juveniles, create and manage sprawling prehistoric parks around the globe, and let your imagination roar with powerful new creative options in Jurassic World Evolution 3. Jurassic World Evolution 3 is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S, and the Kentrosaurus is now available for free.

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #ParkSim

description:
Don't miss the Advanced Access Launch Trailer for Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, an anime third-person action RPG developed by Netmarble Neo. 

Players will assume control of Sung Jin-woo to rise and become an E-Rank Hunter through upgrades, brutal fights, and fast-paced action. Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive is available now in Advanced Access for PC (Steam and Xbox PC), with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S in 2026.

#IGN #SoloLevelingAriseOverdrive #ActionRPG
title: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive - Official Advanced Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Collaboration Animated Trailer for Sword of Convallaria, a free-to-play turn-based tactical RPG developed by XD. 

Players will soon be able to partake in the collaboration event as Geralt, Yennefer, Triss, and Ciri join Sword of Convallaria as playable characters. Access specific gear associated with The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, such as Zireael, the Obsidian Star, the Flames of the Fearless, and the Witcher’s Swords, plus unlockable skins for Geralt, Yennefer, and Triss. The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Collaboration for Sword of Convallaria begins on November 28 through January 22, 2026, for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #SwordOfConvallaria #TheWitcher3
title: Sword of Convallaria x The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Official Collaboration Animated Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Astra Malorum Intro Cinematic Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players can get a look at the intense cutscene for the upcoming zombies map, Astra Malorum, launching with the Season 1 update for the game. The intro sees our classic and new zombies mode heroes battling the undead in an aethereal plane of existence yet to be explored in Astra Malorum, launching with Season 1 for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 on December 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #CallOfDuty #CoDZombies
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Astra Malorum Intro Cinematic Trailer

description: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game is available now on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S. Watch the Terrifier: The ARTcade Game launch trailer for this co-op beat 'em up game to see gameplay, co-op play, and more.
title: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: You may have already seen the latest Tides of Annihilation boss fight gameplay trailer from the Xbox Partner Preview showcase, but we've got an extended version of it that adds 19 extra seconds at the beginning. This battle pits protagonist Gwendolyn fights against a powerful shape-shifting witch named Tyronoe. Gwendolyn is assisted in the fighting by the spear-wielding Sir Lamorak, a Knight of the Roundtable. The trailer also gives us a peek at the combat system called the Dual Frontline Battle System, as you will be able to control both Gwendolyn and Lamorak. We also get a glimpse at a story element with Tyronoe's creation of a mirror-like Folded Realm. Tides of Annihilation will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).
title: Tides of Annihilation - Official Break The Mirror EXTENDED CUT Gameplay Trailer

description:

Code Vein 2 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam on January 30, 2026.

#IGN #CodeVein2 #Soulslike
title: Code Vein 2 - Official Josée Anjou Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Max, Ryan, and Daemon dive into Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick's comments about PC gaming. Zelnick says that gaming as an industry is moving more towards PC, even with the ongoing popularity of the PS5 and Nintendo Switch 2. Valve's recent Steam, Machine announcement makes it very clear that the company is making a play for living rooms—traditionally the domain of gaming consoles—as the next frontier for PC games. What does that mean for Sony and Microsoft? And is it too late for the next Xbox, which promises to be a hybrid console/PC like the Steam Machine? Plus we have poll results from the past two weeks, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
00:00:15 Intro
00:00:35 Is PC the future of console gaming?
00:12:16 Poll results
00:15:42 Outro
title: This Is a PC - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
What are the best maps in Hitman? A question we asked IO Interactives' Chief Creative Officer, Christian Elverdam. From Sapienza and Paris in Hitman 2016, to the Berlin level in Hitman 3, the Hitman developer shares all his favourite Hitman moments from the World of Assassination collection. 

What do you think the best Hitman level is? Let us know in the comments!

#IGN #Hitman #Gaming
title: Hitman Dev's Favourite World of Assassination Maps

author: IGN
description:
Just like every other time I’ve gotten to play Nioh 3, after my time was up, I was left wanting more. Nioh 3 is shaping up to be my favorite of the series to date, not only through its substantial improvements to combat thanks to the split of Samurai and Ninja Modes, but also with the massive addition of the open-field levels – each of which will include its own separate Crucible. Previewed by Mitchell Saltzman

#Nioh3 #Gaming #IGN
title: Nioh 3: The Final Preview

description:
Journey into the darkness of an old Egyptian tomb in Below! 

Armed with a camcorder, you'll explore the pitch black halls and winding passageways under The Great Pyramid. But you're not alone down there, be on your guard! 

Below is developed by GamedevGuy and is available to wishlist on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/4043280/Below

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Right on Top of You' Clip for Greenland 2: Migration, an action thriller distributed by STX Entertainment, Thunder Road Pictures, and Lionsgate. Embark on a journey with Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis as Earth hangs in the balance after an apocalyptic event ravages the planet. Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on January 9, 2026.

In the aftermath of a comet strike that decimated most of the Earth, GREENLAND 2: MIGRATION follows the Garrity family (Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis) as they’re forced to leave the safety of their bunker in Greenland to traverse a shattered world in search of a new home.

Greenland 2: Migration stars Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, Roman Griffin Davis, Amber Rose Revah, Sophie Thompson, Trond Fausa Aurvåg, William Abadie, and more. The film is written by Chris Sparling and Mitchell LaFortune, alongside the film being directed by Ric Roman Waugh.

Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on J
title: Greenland 2: Migration - Official 'Right on Top of You' Clip (2026) Gerard Butler

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Neon Inferno, a 2D pixel-based side-scrolling shooter developed by Zenovia Interactive. Players will shoot their way through a concrete cyberpunk jungle and assume the role of either Angelo or Mariana to fight for a fledgling crime family striving for power against a corrupt NYPD and other crime syndicates in the war-torn city. Neon Inferno is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Neon Inferno - Official Launch Trailer

Players will be able to gear up in their next match with Azami and Lion with Major Motoko Kusanagi and Batou-inspired bundles. The Ghost in the Shell bundles for Rainbow Six Siege is available now.
title: Rainbow Six Siege x Ghost in the Shell - Official Bundle Trailer

author: IGN
description: At an all-boys water polo camp, a socially anxious twelve-year-old is pulled into a cruel tradition targeting an outcast with an illness they call “The Plague.” But as the lines between game and reality blur, he fears the joke might be hiding something real.
title: The Plague - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege, an upcoming 2D side-scrolling action game developed by Lillymo Games. Players will assume the role of Rudiger, an ex-soldier who comes back into his old ways to defend the people against an angry priest on a power trip to steal treasures across the Holy Roman Empire. Dispatch a suite of enemies across 21 stages, attain upgrades, and take out seven powerful bosses alone or with friends in two-player co-op. Become the Saint Slayer in Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege, launching in Early 2026 for PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam), with a demo available now on Steam.
title: Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Berserk B.I.T.S is available now on Steam. Watch the Berserk B.I.T.S launch trailer for this idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop. Meet the characters and see what you can expect from Berserk B.I.T.S in this launch trailer. Let your B.I.T do battle and collect items. Collect rare chips and build your deck! Customize and Level up to take down intense Virus bosses as you unravel the mystery behind the attacks on the Net.

author: IGN
description:
Experience Mafia: The Old Country like never before with the all-new Cinema Siciliano visual mode. This gameplay shows off the moody black-and-white film aesthetic, vintage audio treatment, and Sicilian voiceover set that transform the game into something that feels pulled straight from classic Italian cinema. With a cleaner, more minimal UI and dramatic lighting, this mode reshapes the tone of every shootout, chase, and quiet moment.

28:01 - Escaping on Horse
title: Mafia: The Old Country – Cinema Siciliano Mode Gameplay (Classic Film Mode Visuals)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this Zoopunk extended gameplay trailer for the upcoming action RPG prequel to F.I.S.T.: Forged in Shadow Torch. Set decades before the events of F.I.S.T., ZOOPUNK expands the beloved Animal Punk universe, chronicling the turbulent origins of Torch City, an animal metropolis on the brink of revolution. Zoopunk will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PlayStation 5 Pro (PS5 Pro).

In Zoopunk, players witness the dawn of the First Torch War, when the discovery of the fire seed energy sparks an age of rapid technological progress and catastrophic conflict. As the energy spirals out of control, it awakens mechanical debris into self-aware, unstoppable war machines. Initially created to harness energy, these machines soon adopt violence from their creators, turning against the animals and establishing a mechanical empire bent on domination. With the city in chaos, animals from rival factions must unite to resi
title: Zoopunk - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out 30 minutes of gameplay from Varsapura, the next flagship title from HoYoverse developed on Unreal Engine 5. The Varsapura gameplay video takes you into the mysterious Shadow Bureau and the organization SEAL, as we get a peek at combat as a new player, while using an umbrella weapon, embarks on a test in a fight against Shadow Monsters. We also get a glimpse at a stealth mission, along with the combat style of a secondary character who uses books to fight. The video also introduces us to Mr. Shadow, gives us a hint at the story, city exploration via vehicular transportation, and more.

#IGN #Varsapura #HoYoverse
